change.item:
$Log: j.vit_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2009-11-24 20:08:29 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 16:16:04 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:38:09 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.8 2005/03/30 20:29:11 packel fixed milestone units
Revision 1.7 2003/07/01 22:17:12 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.6 2000/03/08 16:40:18 dasmith Funded by Tufts, not NEH.
Revision 1.5 2000/03/04 20:34:47 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.4 2000/01/31 19:59:16 dasmith Use ED attribute in STATE.
Revision 1.3 1999/08/04 23:57:01 dasmith Mark chunking milestones.
Revision 1.2 1999/07/20 22:43:56 dasmith Regularized resDecl
Revision 1.1 1997/11/21 23:37:04 textgod Added to repository. Passed SGML parse.

body.head: *)iwsh/pou bi/os
body.p:
*)emoi\ de\ ge/nos e)sti
 ou)k a)/shmon, a)ll' e)c i(ere/wn a)/nwqen katabebhko/s. w(/sper d' h( par' e(ka/stois a)/llh ti/s e)stin eu)genei/as u(po/qesis, ou(/tws par' h(mi=n h( th=s i(erwsu/nhs metousi/a tekmh/rio/n e)stin ge/nous lampro/thtos. e)moi\ d' ou) mo/non e)c i(ere/wn e)sti
 to\ ge/nos, a)lla\ kai\ e)k th=s prw/ths e)fhmeri/dos tw=n ei)kositessa/rwn, pollh\ de\ ka)n tou/tw| diafora/, kai\ tw=n e)n tau/th| de\ fulw=n e)k th=s a)ri/sths. u(pa/rxw de\ kai\ tou= basilikou= ge/nous a)po\ th=s mhtro/s: oi( ga *)asamwnai/ou pai=des, w(=n e)/ggonos e)kei/nh, tou= e)/qnous h(mw=n e)pi\ mh/kiston xro/non h)rxiera/teusan kai\ e)basi/leusan. e)rw= de\ th
 diadoxh/n: o( pro/pappos h(mw=n *si/mwn o( *yello\s e)pikalou/menos. ou(=tos e)ge/neto kaq' o(
 kairo
 h)rxiera/teusen *si/mwnos a)rxiere/ws o( pai=s, o(\s prw=tos a)rxiere/wn *(urkano\s w)noma/sqh. gi/nontai de\ tw=| *yellw=| *si/mwni pai=des e)nne/a: tou/twn e)sti
 *matqi/as o( *)hfai/ou lego/menos: ou(=tos h)ga/geto pro\s ga/mon qugate/ra *)iwna/qou a)rxiere/ws tou= prw/tou e)k tw=n *)asamwnai/ou pai/dwn ge/nous a)rxierateu/santos tou= a)delfou=
*si/mwnos ta)rxiere/ws, kai\ gi/netai pai=s au)tw=| *matqi/as o( *kurto\s e)piklhqei\s a)/rxontos *(urkanou= to
 prw=ton e)niauto/n. tou/tou gi/netai *)iw/shpos e)na/tw| e)/tei th=s *)aleca/ndras a)rxh=s, kai\ *)iwsh/pou *matqi/as basileu/ontos *)arxela/ou to\ de/katon, *matqi/a de\ e)gw\ tw=| prw/tw| th=s *gai/+ou *kai/saros h(gemoni/as. e)moi\ de\ pai=de/s ei)sin trei=s, *(urkano\s me
 o( presbu/tatos e)/tei teta/rtw| th=s *ou)espasianou= *kai/saros h(gemoni/as, e(bdo/mw| de\ *)iou=stos, e)na/tw| de\ *)agri/ppas. th
 me
 tou= ge/nous h(mw=n diadoxh/n, w(s e)n tai=s dhmosi/ais de/ltois a)nagegramme/nhn eu(=ron, ou(/tws parati/qemai toi=s diaba/llein h(ma=s peirwme/nois xai/rein fra/sas.

*(o path de/ mou *matqi/as ou) dia\ mo/nhn th
 eu)ge/neian e)pi/shmos h)=n, a)lla\ ple/on dia\ th
 dikaiosu/nhn e)ph|nei=to, gnwrimw/tatos w)
 e)n th=| megi/sth| po/lei tw=n par' h(mi=n toi=s *(ierosolumi/tais.
